mapper.sql: A.ID as A_ID, A.FOLDER_ID as A_FOLDER_ID, A.NAME as A_NAME, A.TYPE as A_TYPE, A.LEARNER_NUMBER as A_LEARNER_NUMBER, A.DESCRIPTION as A_DESCRIPTION, A.STATUS as A_STATUS, A.PROCESS_STATUS as A_PROCESS_STATUS, A.CHECKER as A_CHECKER, A.REMARK as A_REMARK, A.RECORD_STATUS as A_RECORD_STATUS, A.UPDATE_COUNT as A_UPDATE_COUNT, A.CREATOR_ID as A_CREATOR_ID, A.CREATE_DATE as A_CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATER_ID as A_UPDATER_ID, A.UPDATE_DATE as A_UPDATE_DATE, A.START_TIME as A_START_TIME, A.ENT_TIME as A_ENT_TIME
mapper.insert:
select ATY_TRAINING_PLAN_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into ATY_TRAINING_PLAN (ID, FOLDER_ID, NAME, TYPE, LEARNER_NUMBER, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, PROCESS_STATUS, CHECKER, REMARK, RECORD_STATUS, UPDATE_COUNT, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, START_TIME, ENT_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{folderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{learnerNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{checker,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{entTime,jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.update:
update ATY_TRAINING_PLAN A
A.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FOLDER_ID = #{record.folderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.LEARNER_NUMBER = #{record.learnerNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.PROCESS_STATUS = #{record.processStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.CHECKER = #{record.checker,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{record.updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{record.updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
A.START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
A.ENT_TIME = #{record.entTime,jdbcType=DATE},

update ATY_TRAINING_PLAN A
A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FOLDER_ID = #{folderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.LEARNER_NUMBER = #{learnerNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.PROCESS_STATUS = #{processStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ,B.NAME AS CMN_TYPE_NAME,C.FULL_NAME AS ORG_USER_FULL_NAME from ATY_TRAINING_PLAN A LEFT JOIN CMN_TYPE B ON A.TYPE=B.ID LEFT JOIN ORG_USER C ON A.CREATOR_ID=C.ID where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
